root.name: Aconcagua
root.description: StoryYour first glimpse of the titular mountain.Meruza, South America. A revolutionary movement, led by the enigmatic Pachamama, struggles to bring a new age of democracy and freedom to a country governed by an oppresive dictatorship. In an attempt to snuff out the heart of the revolution, a bomb is placed aboard a plane carrying Pachamama to Meruza's capital city, Horizonte.As the plane passes over the Andes, the bomb is detonated and the plane is forced into a crash landing, leaving a group of survivors to work together and brave the treacherous conditions of the mountain known as...Aconcagua.TriviaAlthough the in-game text is primarily Japanese, the voice work is almost entirely recorded in English.
